messages.content: has created windows tasks to establish persistence.

used scheduler and schtasks to create new tasks on remote hosts as part of lateral movement. they have manipulated scheduled tasks by updating an existing legitimate task to execute their tools and then returned the scheduled task to its original configuration.  also created a scheduled task to maintain  persistence when the host booted during the 2020 solarwinds intrusion. they previously used named and hijacked scheduled tasks to also establish persistence.
